scripts.setup: cd playwright-tests && npm install && npx playwright install && cd ../triage-dashboard && npm install
scripts.allure: cd playwright-tests && npm run allure:generate && npx allure open allure-report
scripts.report: cd playwright-tests && npm run allure:generate && npx allure open allure-report
scripts.dashboard: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs -r kill -9 && cd triage-dashboard && npm start
scripts.full:demo: npm run enrich && npm run triage && (npm run test || true) && npm run start:reports
scripts.full:demo-11: npm run enrich && npm run start
scripts.full:demo-12: npm run enrich && npm run allure && npm run start
